column4: ﻿waqas:  for the video nvidia video driver?  envyng they tell me is working on ubuntu 9.04
﻿waqas: legacy what is that for older cards?
MrUnagi: ya or restart the one he now runs with a different config
But if he does not have the Xserver running on the server, he will not be able to conect to it.
yes with this tightvnc I think your correct and I'm not even sure about x11vnc on the new versions of ubuntu
Yes, if he does not have a user logged into the Xserver, he's better off to use tightvnc (vncserver).
Oh no, I see what he's saying.
I'm not sure I've never done it
you can run more than one network on a single nic,  it just won't be as secure
oh maybe in this case you would want two nics since now your on wan direct?
No, he would need to add another NIC
you can run virtual networks but I'm not sure
What you are talking about does not apply to this situation.  (Can not do it with one NIC.)
genii-around  Yea, I looked at fdisk's list of drive types and 55 is indeed "EZ-Drive"
genii-around I suppose if  he would have specified EZ-Drive as filesystem type, he might have been able to mount it.  Right?
I guess it's some method to hide partitions or disk space to hide files?
